price: Leo tunaviziba vinywa vyao, na iseme nasi mikono yao, na itoe ushahidi miguu yao kwa waliyo kuwa wakiyachuma.
arabic: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَخۡتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَتَشۡهَدُ أَرۡجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: Leo vitazibwa vinywa vyao, basi havito tamka kitu. Mikono yao ndiyo itakayo sema nasi, na miguu yao itatamka kwa kutoa ushahidi juu yao kwa waliyo kuwa wakiyafanya.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-yawma nakhtimu ʿalā afwāhihim watukallimunā aydīhim watashhadu arjuluhum bimā kānū yaksibūna
